name: MINIMALL MAYHEM
description:
Created in 5 days for the Flowlab Minimal Game Jam. 

ASWD to move / SPACE BAR to fire. 

3 Waves of Enemies and a Boss fight. Destroy all robots and help the people escape to safety at the bottom of the screen. 

Use 2,3,4 to skip ahead to the next wave -- just be sure to wait until you get out of the car before you try to skip ahead!
